name: HYDRA TANKS!!!
description:
HYDRA TANKS!!!

When one is destroyed, two more shall take its place. Death is only the beginning!

2022 GameDev.TV submission by BeachBlock Games

How many tanks can you destroy before they destroy you?

Collect upgrades to survive as long as you can!

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Move Mouse to Aim

Left Click to Fire

TIPS

Crates drop upgrades when shot. Pick them up quick!

The wooden/barbed wire barricades are destructible.

This is a prototype, so there are exploits, but it will get hard quickly once you start destroying enemies.

A green light on the back of your tank indicates that the turret is loaded and ready to fire!
